1297:8: kṣudreṣvapi pātakeṣu cittena vibheti nityamityucyate bodhisattvasyādiśīlacittam |
1297:9: 2 | śīlācaraṇahetoḥ sarvān parityajati pāpātyayān kuśalāvāsepūtpadyate nityamityasyātmalābhaḥ |
1297:11: caritvābodhaye śīlaṃ pariṇāmya sattveṣvātmanā salābhinaḥ karotityubhavalābhaḥ |
1297:12: śīlācaraṇahetorlabhate vairāgyaṃ yāvatkṣapayatyāsravānparipūrayati cānuttarāṃ samyaksambodhimiti niṣyādayati bodhimārgam ||
1297:14: prathamaṃ kāyaśīlaṃ dvitīyam vākśīlaṃ tṛtīyaṃ cittaśīlam |
1297:16: virataḥ prāṇātipātādvirato'dattādānādvirato'brahmacaryānnapunarvidadhāti prāṇātipātādīnāṃ hetupratyāyāṃnsteṣāmupāyāṃśca na ca praharato sattvāndaṇḍena kāṣṭheneṣṭikayā prastareṇa vā |
1297:17: parakīyamarthajātaṃ parakīyaṃ bhogyajātaṃ yāvattṛṇamātramapi patramātramapi nādattamādatte na ca khalu punaḥ kadācidapimohakaṃ rūpaṃ nirikṣate |
1297:19: 4 | udgṛhṇanvākśīlaṃ sākalyena prajahāti mṛṣāvādaṃ paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ sambhinnapralāpam |
1297:20: na kadāpi pratārayati na ca saṃgatānbhinatti nābhyākhyāti na ca kṛtrimāṃ vācamudāharati nāpi lokāprāsādakamupāyamāracayati bhāṣate viśvastaṃ madhuramakapaṭaṃ bhāṣate nityahitam |
1297:25: śraddhadhāti pāpakarmaṇāmaśūbhaṃ falaṃ bhavatīti bhavanābalena nāśubhānyacarati |
1297:27: ajñānataḥ kurvanpāpāni vibheti paścāttatpatte sattveṣu notpādayati dveṣam |
1297:30: puṇyācaraṇe chandaṃ janayan nityaṃ śikṣayati janān |
1297:33: 6 | eteṣāṃ daśakuśalakarmapathānāṃ paṃcākāro lābhaḥ nigṛhyate duścaritamiti prathamaḥ |
1297:58: kuśalaśīlagrahaṇatvātkaroti sarvasattvāṃllābhinaḥ gṛhṇan maitrīcittaśīlaṃ paritrāyate sukhayituṃ sattvān |
1297:62: gṛhṇāti dānaśīlaṃ śikṣayituṃ sāntvayituṃ ca sarvasattvāt |
1297:63: gṛhṇan kṣāntiśīlaṃ bhavati nityaṃ mṛducitto dveṣāvaraṇabaprahīṇatvāt |
1297:66: gṛhṇan prajñāśīlaṃ bahu śṛṇoti kuśalamūlaṃ (tatprati) atṛpteḥ |
1297:69: 10 | bodhisattvo gṛhṇanpariśuddhaśīlaṃ na pratiṣṭhito bhavati kāmadhātau na ca rūpadhātau nāpi ca pratiṣṭhito bhavatyarūpadhātāviti pariśuddhaśīlam |
1297:71: parihārati dvāvantau śāśvatam cocchedaṃ cāpratilaumahetupratyayeneti pariśuddhaśīlam|
1297:73: na badhnāti hetau notpādayati dṭaṣṭīrna pratiṣṭhāpayati vicikitsākaukṛtye iti pariśuddhaśīlam |
1297:75: na pratiṣṭhāpayatyātmamānaṃ madamānamabhimānaṃ mānātimānaṃ mahāmānaṃ mṛduḥ kuśalasnigdho bhavatīti pariśuddhaśīlam |
1297:76: neñjati lābhālābhanindāpraśaṃsāyaśo'yaśasukhaduḥkheṣu nānulipyate lokasatye śūnye prajñatau bhavati cānugataḥ paramārthasatyamiti pariśuddhaśīlam |
1297:78: saṃkṣepata ucyate kāyajīvita nirapekṣo'nityasaṃjñādarśanenotpādayati vairāgyaṃ sodyogaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhāvayannabhyutsāhena vīryamācaratīti pariśūddhaśīlam |
1297:79: bodhisattvasya śīlamācarato na bhavati pariśūddhacittadṭaṣṭiḥ saṃjñāvimuktihetoritīyaṃ śīlapāramitā ||
1297:80: ( iti bodhicittātpādasuitraśāstre śīlapāramitā nāma paṃcamo vargaḥ || )
